function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Retrospective observational studies associating weather variables with the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"May lead to incomplete understanding of the relationship between weather variables and COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct prospective studies along with retrospective ones to provide comprehensive evidence","Technologies":"Data modeling and analysis tools","People":"Population in the studied areas","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity in weather conditions beyond temperature and humidity","Impact":"Influence on the accuracy and generalizability of findings","Mitigation":"Standardize data collection methods and variables across studies","Technologies":"Data standardization and quality control tools","People":"Research and data collection teams","Owner":"Health and environmental research organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity in data collection dates and locations","Impact":"Limits comparability and robustness of study results","Mitigation":"Establish standardized protocols for data collection and reporting","Technologies":"Data collection and management systems","People":"Research and data collection teams","Owner":"Public health and environmental agencies"}]}
